Title: Episode 4
Plot: Logan emerges from his coma, but is upset to hear of Ben's death. After being discharged from hospital, he returns to his old flat in London, where he struggles to make ends meet. In a bid to make the most of his life, he becomes involved with an anti-fascist organisation - only to discover his new friends have sinister plans. Drama, starring Jim Broadbent, Matthew Macfadyen and Julian Rhind-Tutt.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language, sexual references & nudity
GuestStars: Jim Broadbent, Connor Nealon and Ken Bones
